oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Johnny Bond Performances - Columbia Records Unreleased Masters
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performances of unreleased master track recordings, as performed by Johnny Bond (performer), from 1941, 1942, 1945 and 1947.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Johnny Bond
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Lover by Appointment (Johnny Bond) -- (02:45) Don't Take it Away (Johnny Bond) -- (05:13) Look Behind You (Hollywood) (Johnny Bond) -- (07:54) Blues in Nothing Flat (Johnny Bond) -- (10:17) The Man From Texas (Johnny Bond) -- (12:51) Look Behind You (Nashville) (Johnny Bond) -- (15:49) Wildcat Baby (Johnny Bond) -- (17:57) Fast Women and Sloe Gin (Johnny Bond) -- (20:37) Old Couch (Johnny Bond) -- (23:05) Rally Round the Table Boys (Johnny Bond) -- (25:52) I Won't Bother You Anymore [unconfirmed] (Johnny Bond) -- (28:20) Silent Wallks (Johnny Bond)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Bond, Johnny; Bond, Johnny, 1915-1978;
